channel.title: I want to run my server 24/7
channel.description: i want to but im not allowd to keep the computer on so i need to know.. is there a way to keep applications running on windows shutdown.

item.title: I want to run my server 24/7
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Or buy a VPS.

item.title: I want to run my server 24/7
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

The only way you can run your server with your computer off is have someone host it for you. If you decide to do that, I suggest taking a look at this file sharing program to help out you and your hoster. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,368114.0.html

Read full topic
